Title: Man's world is mutable, seas become mulberry fields: Chairman Mao inspects the situation of the Great Proletarian Revolution in Northern, South-Central and Eastern China
Designer: Zhejiang Worker-Peasant-Soldier Art Academy (浙江工农兵美术大学)Zheng Shengtian (郑胜天)Zhou Ruiwen (周瑞文)Xu Junxuan (徐君萱)
Publisher: Zhejiang renmin meishu chubanshe (浙江人民美术出版社)
Notes: The phrase 'Man's world is mutable, seas become mulberry fields' is from a poem by Mao.
